sourcesContent:
import { Box, Flex, Heading, Image, Text } from "@chakra-ui/react";
import React from "react";
import Contactchild from "../Components/ContactChild";
import {
  AiFillGithub,
  AiFillLinkedin,
  AiOutlineMail,
  AiOutlinePhone,
} from "react-icons/ai";

import { Icon } from "@chakra-ui/react";
import Github from "../Components/Github";
const Contact = () => {
  return (
    <Box id="contact" p={10}>
      <Heading>Get In Touch</Heading>
      <Box
        w="100%"
        h="100%"
        display="flex"
        flexDirection={["column", "column", "row"]}
        justifyContent="space-evenly"
        alignItems="center"
      >
        <Box w="40%">
          <Contactchild />
          <Box display="flex" width="70%" justifyContent="space-between" pt={2}>
            <Box id="contact-github">
              <Icon as={AiFillGithub} fontSize="2rem" />
              <Text>Github</Text>
            </Box>
            <Box id="contact-linkedin">
              <Icon as={AiFillLinkedin} fontSize="2rem" />
              <Text>LinkedIN</Text>
            </Box>

            <Box id="contact-phone">
              <Icon as={AiOutlinePhone} fontSize="2rem" />
              <Text>Phone</Text>
            </Box>
            <Box id="contact-email" >
              <Icon as={AiOutlineMail} fontSize="2rem" />
              <Text>Gmail</Text>
            </Box>
          </Box>
        </Box>
        <Box>
          <Image
            boxSize="30rem"
            src="https://img.freepik.com/free-vector/contact-us-concept-landing-page_52683-12759.jpg?w=1060&t=st=1676964477~exp=1676965077~hmac=f22ec03f78c2ca0f4056d3f34acf197138e59b2f5b419117cf7d9bda5e20acbb"
            alt="SHIVAM"
          />
        </Box>
      </Box>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default Contact;
